name: Yeti vs 5G
description:
A story about a Yeti wanting to destroy a 5G tower by throwing it over the edge of the Earth. His path will lead him through the dangerous Area 51 full of UFO's. Oh and also, there is a hidden level where you can kill Hitler. Based on a true story. Who needs proof, just play the game!

The game was created in 72 hours for ScoreSpace x Alakajam game jam.

The theme was "Connections",  which I exploited within the 5G connection dangers myths and conspiracy theories connections

Controls:

- Directional arrow keys to move

- Space to jump

-R to restart the game

Parts of the game:

-Go left from the menu to read the "about section"

-Go right from the menu to enter the arcade level, with a highscore mode.

   You just need to jump on as much UFO's as possible. (please note that the game is mainly intended to be played in the story mode and the arcade mode is very limited)

-Jump down the hole in the middle right to start the story mode, the main game mode
